name: My Nigerian Prince
description:
Dear Sir or Madam, my name is Funmini Owo. I am a prince from Nigeria.
I am currently being held hostage and I need your assistance...

Meet Caitlin. She's a girl just like you. She likes videogames and checking her e-mail—you know, like the cool kids do. But one day, her life changes when she gets an e-mail from the deposed prince of Nigeria. Can she save him? Will they find love? Or will her feelings end up...in the spam folder?

Key features:

  • A short visual novelette about spam e-mail and the people who send it.
  • Seven (!?) different endings to unlock! Whoa!
  • Hand-drawn art! (Like, literally; it was drawn on paper and scanned into a computer.)
  • Story by popular YouTube personality Michael "arglefumph" Gray.
  • Playable in both English and Spanish!
  • (Seriously it's super short. Maybe go outside after playing it?)

Try before you buy!

Here's a Let's Play video by AceFangirl, featuring two of the game's pathways. Find out now if My Nigerian Prince is YOUR Nigerian Prince!

If you liked My Nigerian Prince, check out our other games or say hi to us on Facebook or Twitter!
